metadata.title: Tuesday, 29th October, 2013
metadata.session: THIRD SESSION OF THE ELEVENTH ASSEMBLY

questions.minister: Minister of Home Affairs whether there exists any rule that prohibits a Member of Parliament from visiting a relative who is incarcerated at a prison facility.

Minister of Community Development, Mother and Child Health what measures have been taken to ensure that the allocation of empowerment funds to clubs, groups and associations country-wide is equitable.

parts: (a)when the Board of Survey last verified GRZ motor vehicles for purposes of disposal;
(b)how many motor vehicles were earmarked for disposal;
(c)when the motor vehicles at (b) were auctioned; and
(d)how much money was realised from the sale.

questions.minister: Minister of Transport, Works, Supply and Communication
parts: (a)when bridges across the following Rivers in Lupososhi Parliamentary Constituency will be constructed:
(i)     Lufubu, connecting Mufili to Muselawamangu Wards; and (ii)    Kafisa to Mununshi in Kafisa Ward; and
(b)when the Kaunga/Lwefi Bridge in Nalolo Parliamentary Constituency will be repaired.

questions.minister: Minister of Local Government and Housing when the Government will construct houses in Milenge District to mitigate the shortage of accommodation.

parts: (a)whether the diplomats who were recalled after September, 2011 have all returned home;
(b)whether the former diplomats have been paid their terminal benefits; and
(c)if not, when the benefits will be paid.

questions.minister: Minister of Youth and Sport when the Government will commence the construction of a Youth Development Centre in Chisamba District.
parts: (a)how much money was approved from women empowerment projects in 2011 and 2012, province by province;
(b)how many projects were approved during the same period, province by province; and

(c)what measures have been taken to ensure that the distribution of women empowerment funds in provinces country-wide is equitable. ORDER OF THE DAY 1    Supply - Motion (11th October) - Resumption of Debate - (Brig Gen Dr Chituwo).
